org.hps.monitoring.application.model

Class Configuration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hps.monitoring.application.model.Configuration

  • public final class Configuration
extends Object
    This class provides a list of key, value pairs backed by a Properties object. The getter and setter methods for these values are not public, because the ConfigurationModel class should be used instead to get or set application configuration values.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private File file
      The file containing the keys and values.
      private Properties properties
      The Java properties file.
      private String resourcePath
      The path to an embedded properties resource from a jar.
